verbs.description: [ARG0: The North Korean dictator] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] [ARG1: he would halt nuke tests and intercontinental missile launches ahead of an expected summit with US President Donald Trump] .
The North Korean dictator announced on Saturday he [V: would] halt nuke tests and intercontinental missile launches ahead of an expected summit with US President Donald Trump .

The North Korean dictator announced on Saturday [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: halt] [ARG1: nuke tests and intercontinental missile launches] [ARGM-TMP: ahead of an expected summit with US President Donald Trump] .
The North Korean dictator announced on Saturday he would halt nuke tests and intercontinental missile launches ahead of an [V: expected] [ARG1: summit] with US President Donald Trump .
